entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Îles-de-la-Madeleine
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:54 AM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Îles de la Madeleine Airport 10:00 AM AST Sunday 05 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -4.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -9.1°C
Wind: NW 41 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning this afternoon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 05 March 2023
